title: what is this nice handwriting font?
content:
Can't find it anywhere. What font is it?  
THANKS for the help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202133745/http:/typophile.com/files/font_165.jpg) | 41.9 KB |
author: wfz

comments.content:
That's Chumley from Chank. The sample below is from Part 12 of the Script Font ID Guide.

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202133745im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chumleymed_5515.gif)

That's great. Thanks for the help. Is there any free font that looks similar?

THANKS!

Check DaFont.com for a handwriting font. That is probably your "best" bet.

[evan](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202133745/http:/www.evanmade.com/)
